statements: SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels;
SELECT soil_id, nitrogen_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels WHERE potassium_level > 10;
SELECT nitrogen_level, potassium_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels ORDER BY phosphorus_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels WHERE nitrogen_level BETWEEN 2.5 AND 5.0;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS nutrient_count FROM soil_nutrient_levels WHERE phosphorus_level < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels
SELECT soil_id, nitrogen_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels ORDER BY phosphorus_level DESC
SELECT potassium_level, phosphorus_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.5
SELECT * FROM soil_nutrient_levels WHERE potassium_level < 0.3 ORDER BY nitrogen_level
SELECT AVG(nitrogen_level) AS avg_nitrogen_level FROM soil_nutrient_levels
SELECT * FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels;
SELECT Nitrogen_Level, Phosphorus_Level FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE Potassium_Level > 2.0;
SELECT Soil_ID, Nitrogen_Level, Phosphorus_Level FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE Nitrogen_Level < 1.5 ORDER BY Phosphorus_Level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fertilization_Practices WHERE Nitrogen_Content > 0.0 AND Phosphorus_Content > 0.0;
SELECT Fertilizer_Name, Nitrogen_Content, Potassium_Content FROM Fertilization_Practices ORDER BY Nitrogen_Content ASC, Potassium_Content DESC;
SELECT Nitrogen_Level, Potassium_Level, Phosphorus_Level FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE Potassium_Level > 2.5 ORDER BY Nitrogen_Level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE Nitrogen_Level < 1.0 AND Phosphorus_Level > 3.0;
SELECT Fertilizer_Name, Nitrogen_Content, Potassium_Content, Phosphorus_Content FROM Fertilization_Practices WHERE Nitrogen_Content >= 2.0 ORDER BY Potassium_Content ASC;
SELECT Soil_ID, Nitrogen_Level, Potassium_Level FROM Soil_Nutrient_Levels WHERE Nitrogen_Level BETWEEN 1.5 AND 2.5;
SELECT Fertilizer_Name, Nitrogen_Content, Potassium_Content FROM Fertilization_Practices WHERE Phosphorus_Content < 1.0 AND Potassium_Content > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT location, nitrogen_level FROM soil_samples WHERE phosphorus_level > 0.5;
SELECT sample_id, location FROM soil_samples ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE nitrogen_content >= 0.3 AND phosphorus_content <= 0.2;
SELECT name, recommended_amount FROM fertilizers INNER JOIN recommendations ON fertilizers.fertilizer_id = recommendations.fertilizer_id ORDER BY recommended_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE nitrogen_level > 0.5 AND phosphorus_level < 0.3;
SELECT location, nitrogen_level FROM soil_samples WHERE location NOT LIKE '%Farm%';
SELECT recommendations.recommendation_id, fertilizers.name, recommendations.recommended_amount FROM recommendations JOIN fertilizers ON recommendations.fertilizer_id = fertilizers.fertilizer_id;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY recommended_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(sample_id) AS sample_count, AVG(recommended_amount) AS avg_recommendation FROM recommendations GROUP BY sample_id HAVING avg_recommendation > 50;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level > 5;
SELECT location, potassium_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE phosphorus_level < 3;
SELECT sample_id, nitrogen_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE potassium_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, analyzed_date, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level FROM SampleAnalysis WHERE potassium_level = 4.5;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, location, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE potassium_level > 0;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers ORDER BY nitrogen_content DESC, potassium_content ASC;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.location, a.analyzed_date FROM SoilSamples s INNER JOIN SampleAnalysis a ON s.sample_id = a.sample_id WHERE a.nitrogen_level > 5 AND a.phosphorus_level < 3;

SELECT f.fertilizer_name, SUM(f.nitrogen_content) AS total_nitrogen, SUM(f.phosphorus_content) AS total_phosphorus FROM Fertilizers f GROUP BY f.fertilizer_name HAVING total_nitrogen > 50 AND total_phosphorus < 30;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, location, nitrogen_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE potassium_level > 0.5;
SELECT farmer_id, name, address FROM Farmers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT field_id, field_area, soil_type FROM FarmFields WHERE last_plantation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT F.name, R.recommended_amount FROM Fertilizers F JOIN Recommendations R ON F.fertilizer_id = R.fertilizer_id;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level > 2.5 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT sample_id, location, potassium_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE phosphorus_level < 1.0
SELECT * FROM Recommendations INNER JOIN Fertilizers ON Recommendations.fertilizer_id = Fertilizers.fertilizer_id WHERE Recommendations.recommended_amount > 50 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC
SELECT field_id, farmer_id, field_area FROM FarmFields WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY last_plantation_date ASC
SELECT name, phone_number, address FROM Farmers
